alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 4:29AM EST until January 14 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /1 PM EST/ TODAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower single digits to around zero degrees, along with brisk northwest winds, will produce wind chill readings from -10 to around -20 degrees. * WHERE...This advisory is for all of southern Illinois, southwest Indiana, northwest Kentucky, and most of southeast Missouri. * WHEN...until noon CST /1 PM EST/ today. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution if you go outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Take the necessary precautions to protect household items such as water lines and pets.
